item.description:
Agenda

  • 07:00 - 07:30 Fast networking, exchange business cards
  • 07:30 - 08:00 Getting Your Brand Online (1): Using Facebook for your Business
  • 08:00 - 08:30 Bring your own challenges - discussion, networking


About the Presentation:
Have you ever wondered how you might be able to use Facebook to increase awareness levels of your company, product or service? Kate Brodock and Anya Woods of Other Side will lead a discussion on the ins and outs of the tool, examples of how other individuals and companies have used the tool for business purposes, and suggest ways you can get yourself started.

About the Presenter:
Other Side Group is a local service company offering a high level of expertise in spaces such as marketing strategy, new media and social media, and brand management.
http://www.othersideg...

About "Getting Your Brand Online" Series:
This will be a series of topics about tools and methods of marketing and creating a brand online.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the backroom. There are two metered parking lots near by.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Getting Your Brand Online (1): Using Facebook for your Business
